title: Brother's Live Cartoon booking service website

requirements.summary: Create a landing page displaying business information for Brother's Live Cartoon
acceptanceCriteria: All business information is displayed clearly and accurately
Character list shows all six characters mentioned
Address and contact information are prominently visible

file_operations.description: Add landing page layout displaying business information including company name 'BROTHER'S LIVE CARTOON', tagline 'Live Cartoon Characters', full address 'Raval Chakala, Jaghnath Bhaghol, Umreth - 388220, Dist - Anand', contact phone '9427065911', list of available characters (Gorilla, Red Teddy, Yellow Teddy, Doraemon, Mickey Mouse, Motu-Patlu), event types (Birthday Party, Wedding Entry, and other Events), and service highlights (High Quality Costumes, Energetic Performers, Reasonable Rates)
Create component displaying company name, tagline, address, and contact phone number with appropriate visual hierarchy

Create component displaying the six available characters: Gorilla, Red Teddy, Yellow Teddy, Doraemon, Mickey Mouse, and Motu-Patlu with their respective generated images from frontend/public/assets/generated
Create component displaying service highlights: High Quality Costumes, Energetic Performers, and Reasonable Rates, along with event types supported: Birthday Party, Wedding Entry, and other Events

requirements.summary: Implement a 'Call Now' button that opens the phone dialer with prefilled number
acceptanceCriteria: Call button is clearly visible and labeled 'Call Now'
Clicking the button opens the device's phone dialer

file_operations.description: Create component with 'Call Now' button that uses tel: scheme to open phone dialer with number 9427065911 prefilled
Wire ContactButtons component into the landing page layout in a prominent position

requirements.summary: Implement a 'Book on WhatsApp' button with prefilled message
acceptanceCriteria: WhatsApp button is clearly visible and labeled 'Book on WhatsApp'
Clicking the button opens WhatsApp web or app
Message is prefilled with the exact text: 'Hello BROTHER'S LIVE CARTOON, I want to book a cartoon character.'
Message is addressed to the correct WhatsApp number: 919427065911

file_operations.description: Add 'Book on WhatsApp' button that opens WhatsApp using https://wa.me/919427065911 with URL-encoded prefilled message 'Hello BROTHER'S LIVE CARTOON, I want to book a cartoon character.'

requirements.summary: Apply vibrant, playful visual theme with orange as primary brand color
acceptanceCriteria: Orange is used as the primary accent color throughout the design
Typography is clear, friendly, and appropriate for a family service
Overall design feels warm, inviting, and professional
Layout uses visual hierarchy to guide users to key information and action buttons

file_operations.description: Configure orange as the primary brand color in the theme colors, add warm accent colors, and configure friendly rounded design tokens
Apply warm, inviting color palette with orange accent, configure friendly typography suitable for children's entertainment service, and set up playful visual styling with rounded shapes

requirements.summary: Render generated character images as static assets and display them in character showcase
acceptanceCriteria: Character images are stored in frontend/public/assets/generated directory
Images are displayed in the available characters section
Images load correctly and enhance the visual presentation

file_operations.description: Wire in generated character images from frontend/public/assets/generated: gorilla.dim_400x400.png for Gorilla, red-teddy.dim_400x400.png for Red Teddy, yellow-teddy.dim_400x400.png for Yellow Teddy, doraemon.dim_400x400.png for Doraemon, mickey-mouse.dim_400x400.png for Mickey Mouse, and motu-patlu.dim_400x400.png for Motu-Patlu
Create hero banner component using generated image frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png showing vibrant birthday party scene with cartoon characters and children celebrating
Wire HeroBanner component into the landing page at the top of the layout
